name: It Came from the Dessert
description:
The cake fills your kitchen with giant ants.
Bait them with pizza slices into kitchen objects to kill them.

Look around the kitchen with your mouse. Move around with WASD.
Throw pizza slices with the left mouse button. Up to 6 pizza slices at once.
Use the right mouse button to open kitchen objects to activate the murder utensils.
Retrieve the pizza slices by clicking on them again with the left mouse button.
Press R to recall all pizza slices.

Made for Ludum Dare 37 ("One Room") by:
- Alvar Gamez Zerban
- Christian Reuter
- Polona Caserman
- Robert Konrad
